thread.title: HMH Appoints New General Manager at Corp Amman Hotel
thread.title_full: HMH Appoints New General Manager at Corp Amman Hotel

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: HMH Appoints New General Manager at Corp Amman Hotel
text:
HMH Appoints New General Manager at Corp Amman Hotel   
Oct 13, 2015 eTN   
HMH - Hospitality Management Holdings has appointed Nizam Bou Antoun as the New General Manager of Corp Amman Hotel. With over 18 years’ experience in the hospitality industry, Nizam brings an in-depth knowledge of rooms division, revenue management and, sales and marketing. 
Making the announcement, Laurent A. Voivenel, CEO of HMH, stated, "Corp Amman Hotel is a fabulous property. We are delighted to bring someone of Nizam’s caliber to lead the exceptional team at Corp Amman Hotel. His expertise and experience will prove invaluable in optimizing the hotel’s performance and market positioning”. 
Lebanese national, Nizam holds an MBA degree in Hospitality Management from Baytown University in Texas, USA. His last posting was as the General Manager at Park Inn by Radisson in Al Khobar, KSA. 
Upon joining Corp Amman Hotel, Nizam, said, “I am truly grateful to HMH – Hospitality Management Holdings for having given me this opportunity. Jordan is a very unique destination and I am very excited to take up this new challenge.” 
Nizam started his career in Paris. Over the years, working with several leading hotels. 
Corp Amman Hotel is a 4-star property with 108 elegantly rooms and suites in Beirut, Lebanon
